description: The pedestrian was taken to hospital with life-threatening injuries after the crash in Normanton.
title: Man seriously hurt after being hit by HGV
title_page: Man seriously hurt after being hit by HGV in Normanton  - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been seriously injured after he was hit by a lorry in Normanton.
The male pedestrian was in collision with the HGV on Loscoe Lane at 12:35 GMT on Tuesday, West Yorkshire Police said.
The man was taken to hospital with "life-threatening" injuries, the force added.
The road between Normanton Bypass and Sewerbridge Lane was temporarily closed while officers carried out enquiries.
